query:
SELECT s.id, s.companyName, u.openId, u.name 
FROM suppliers s 
LEFT JOIN users u ON s.ownerId = u.id 
WHERE s.companyName = 'Test Supplier';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PejtppQzUdF9US.e7bec8248b17 --database 2cukUCNz2S5THQpLSDbdYn --execute SELECT s.id, s.companyName, u.openId, u.name
